upasampadashiley guna mahathwaya kiya nimakala ෙnohaka.enisa eya ෙkotiyak sanwarashilayese dakew.ෙkotiya yanuewan adahaswanuey gananin pakashakalenohaki bawayi.mawkiriwala gunathmakabawa misapumanathmakabawa agayanuenolabannak ෙmani.upasampadawa adhishilasankha ාtha bawayi.widarshana bhawanaewdiwadana adhi chiththa ha adhi pagnya yana dwiwidha shikshawalata ekwana adhishilaya upasampadawaya.upasampadawa labadiyahakek samma sambuduwareyaku wisinma pamanaki.in pasuwa buduraduneg adudanuma matha bhikshu sanghaya wisinupasampadawa akhandawa pawathwagani.ee sandaha buduradun wisin bhikshu sanghayata balaya pawara thieb.
